content: Short question about the canonical chain: section 10 describes this but I cannot seem to find the explicit answer I'm looking for. Is the canonical chain the one with the highest total difficulty OR the one with the highest block number? I am 99% sure it should be the prior otherwise this would be open to some attack vectors
